title: Central Heat & Air Conditioning, Washer & Dryer Hook-Ups*
map_address: 10756 E Virginia Ave near S Havana St
posting_body: ['$300-$400 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'Welcome to Trailpoint on Highline Apartments', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 46', 'OR Text', '46', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 830 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'It is time that your search for Aurora, CO apartments came to an end at Trailpoint on Highline.', 'Named for the adjacent High Line Canal & Trail, our beautiful community provides you with direct access to Expo Park – 57 acres offering infinite outdoor adventures for you and your four-legged best friend.', 'Venture out to find shopping at The Gardens on Havana, education at the Wings Over the Rockies Air & Space Museum, and great eats at numerous restaurants.', 'And, for the days when you need to go even further, you will appreciate being close to I-225 and the light rail.', 'Features:', 'Spacious Walk-In Closets*, Wood Burning Fireplace, Beautiful 1- and 2-Bedroom Renovated Apartment Homes, Central Heat & Air Conditioning, Wood-Style Plank Flooring, Private Balcony, Washer & Dryer Hook-Ups*', '*In Select Homes', 'Community Amenities:', 'Two Heated Sparkling Swimming Pools with Sundecks, On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, and On-Call Courtesy Patrol, Pet-Friendly Community, 24-Hour On-Site Laundry Facilities, Great Location Near the Highline Canal Trail, Dining, Shopping, and Entertainment', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', '0o54wTJnOYog']
